scripts.prettier:fix: git ls-tree -r `git branch --show-current` --name-only | grep -E '.[tj]?sx?$|.yaml$|.json$' | grep -v assets | grep -v lerna.json | xargs -P 1 prettier --write
scripts.prettier:check: git ls-tree -r `git branch --show-current` --name-only | grep -E '.[tj]?sx?$|.yaml$|.json$' | grep -v assets | grep -v lerna.json | xargs -P 1 -I "{}" sh -c '[ -f {} ] && echo {} || true' | xargs prettier --check
scripts.style:fix: lerna run lint:fix && lerna run prettier:fix
